problem.markdown:
>>Which statement describes an implicit measure? <<
( ) An implicit measure is one that you create manually. ( ) An implicit measure is one that comes from outside the data model (x) An implicit measure is one that Excel generates for you when you add fields to the Values area of a pivot table. ( ) An implicit measure is one that you create using MDX formulas.
[explanation] An implicit measure is one that Excel generates for you when you add fields to the Values area of a pivot table. [explanation]
